txt.en: Looking down the stair, you wonder how you ever mustered the courage to make the ascent
The road leading to Nar's Peak is a long and arduous one.
Ascend the stair to Nár's Peak
Climb the stairs to Nár's Peak.
Reach the top of the stairs to Nár's Peak
Looking up the stairs, you wonder how you ever survived to make it to the top.
